title: Rioters Please Take Notice Of My Case
body: I just found out I have MS, Which is a disease if you don't know, I have my main account banned duo to my bi-polar/schizophrenia - something along the lines of a long-term mental disorder of a type involving a breakdown in the relation between thought, emotion, and behavior, leading to faulty perception, inappropriate actions and feelings, So I do apologize for being toxic in game, I'm currently receiving professional help. I'm asking you guys for one more chance, I will show teamwork, and great team effort and feedback, and communicate as positive as I possibly can, I just came out of the hospital as a new man except the fact that I have MS and I may not be around very long or move certain parts of my body, I was hoping this is a case you could look into and maybe solve out of generosity. I have proof all medical papers, Diagnoses, Etc All I'm asking is for another shot at enjoying the game on my Main account I've spent 4-5 years playing on I'd love to purchase some new skins but not on another account. Thank you Kindest Regards - Tony

replies.body:
Your other thread was deleted for multiple posts. However, I will re-iterate that all permanent bans are permanent, unless issued in error. Your penalty was not given in error, and you have a long history of penalties.

I will reply to your comments, as quoted:

> and Not one of them gave me a ban warning how is that fair at all how is that even logical?

If you read the reform cards given to you in all of your previous penalties, it very clearly states that continuing with your behavior would result in a permanent ban. Every one of those penalties warned you about this.

> 6 penaltys over 4-5 years?

You had 6 penalties in the last 11 months.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=YlOv4E2g,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-03-03T22:30:29.274+0000)
>
> You had 6 penalties in the last 11 months.

Oh snap.

Hello Riot Tantram, if you have the time and if at all possible could you look at my thread? I could really use a rioters help on this issue. Thank you for your time. 

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/a5uPPgix-permanently-suspended-due-to-3rd-party-programs-that-i-have-never-used

Open support ticket

best of luck
I would suggest with a disease such as MS to get off of League and go live your life to the fullest.
Stop doing drugs, get your brain working properly again, then think about playing team games again.
